类 Triple

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardList
      • Hand
        • Triple
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Triple
extends Hand
    This is used to model a hand of Triple.

    davidliu

      • Triple

        public Triple(CardGamePlayer player,
              CardList cards)
        Constructor for the triple class
        参数:
        player - The player who play the triple
        cards - The cards that composes the triple

    • 方法详细资料

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        从类复制的说明: Hand
        A method for checking if this is a valid hand
        指定者:
        isValid 在类中 Hand
        返回:
        True when this hand is valid False otherwise

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        从类复制的说明: Hand
        A method for returning a string specifying the type of this hand
        指定者:
        getType 在类中 Hand
        返回:
        A string represent the type, i.e. Single, Pair, Triple, Straight, Flush, FullHouse, Quad and StraightFlush
